The overall objective of the UEC programme is to boost entrepreneurship and job creation by SMEs in post-war countries Burundi, Kosovo, Liberia, Palestinian Territories and Rwanda, through capacity building of CSOs, assistance to local entrepreneurs and SMEs and improving the business environment. The aim of the mid-term evaluation was to ensure that the UEC programme will meet its overall objectives by the end of the programme in 2015. The evaluation looked at the relevance, efficiency, effectiveness of the programme.
